1.16.5.1.3.3: Refactored lots of code for better readability.
1.16.5.1.3.2: Minor code cleanup and changes to the Thonk Wand.
1.16.5.1.3.1: Minor changes to the Thonk Wand tooltips for improved readability.
1.16.5.1.3.0: Added the Thonk Wand! It summons lightning wherever the player looks, with a 5 second cooldown. Comes with tooltip text containing information.
1.16.5.1.2.3: New update.json file which allows the user to know when the mod has an update.
1.16.5.1.2.2: Added drops for Thonk Ore, includes for a normal pickaxe, a fortune-enchanted pickaxe, and a silk-touch-enchanted pickaxe. Mining without a pickaxe will not drop anything.
